attributes.action: Theresa May to step down as she doesn’t reflect people’s opinion
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has wrongly deported thousands of students.
Theresa May’s Home Office policies were failure and discriminatory and couldn’t control migration. Her reign was a failure.
Theresa May had plan to 'deprioritise' illegal migrant pupils is horrendous under Human Rights.
Theresa May initiated the absurd vans carrying billboards telling illegal immigrants to leave
Theresa May travelled to Saudi Arabia for secret advice deal, the country whose criminal justice system is infamous for its barbarity and medieval cruelty.
Mistreatment of female asylum seekers by Home Office contractors at the Yarl’s Wood detention centre
Mrs May banned the UN’s special rapporteur on violence against women from visiting the centre
attributes.background:
Theresa May has failed to condemn Donald Trump’s policy on refugees and Muslims
Mrs.May has failed to acknowledge High Court and Supreme Court rulings with regards to Brexit.
Mrs. May is driving us towards a hard Brexit without any plan
Mrs.May is failing those on zero-hours without job security

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
